env.name: AUTOPAUSE
env.description: pause game when no player is connected
env.label: AUTOPAUSE

env.name: AUTOSAVEINTERVAL
env.description: autosave interval in seconds
env.label: AUTOSAVEINTERVAL

env.name: AUTOSAVENUM
env.description: number of rotating autosave files
env.label: AUTOSAVENUM

env.name: AUTOSAVEONDISCONNECT
env.description: autosave when last player disconnects
env.label: AUTOSAVEONDISCONNECT

env.name: CRASHREPORT
env.description: automatic crash reporting
env.label: CRASHREPORT

env.name: DEBUG
env.label: DEBUG
env.description: for debugging the server

env.name: DISABLESEASONALEVENTS
env.label: DISABLESEASONALEVENTS
env.description: disable the FICSMAS event (you miserable bastard)

env.name: MAXPLAYERS
env.label: MAXPLAYERS
env.description: set the player limit for your server

env.name: PGID
env.label: PGID
env.description: set the group ID of the user the server will run as

env.name: PUID
env.label: PUID
env.description: set the user ID of the user the server will run as

env.name: SKIPUPDATE
env.label: SKIPUPDATE
env.description: avoid updating the game on container start/restart

env.name: STEAMBETA
env.description: set experimental game version
env.label: STEAMBETA

env.name: SESSION_NAME
env.label: SESSION_NAME
env.description: The name of your ARK-session which is visible in game when searching for servers

env.name: SERVER_MAP
env.label: SERVER_MAP
env.description: Desired map you want to play

env.name: SERVER_PASSWORD
env.label: SERVER_PASSWORD
env.description: Server password which is required to join your session. (overwrite with empty string if you want to disable password authentication)

env.name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.label: ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.description: Admin-password in order to access the admin console of ARK

env.name: MAX_PLAYERS
env.label: MAX_PLAYERS
env.description: Maximum number of players to join your session

env.name: UPDATE_ON_START
env.description: Whether you want to update the ARK-server upon startup or not
env.label: UPDATE_ON_START

env.name: BACKUP_ON_STOP
env.description: Create a backup before gracefully stopping the ARK-server
env.label: BACKUP_ON_STOP

env.name: PRE_UPDATE_BACKUP
env.label: PRE_UPDATE_BACKUP
env.description: Create a backup before updating ARK-server

env.name: WARN_ON_STOP
env.label: WARN_ON_STOP
env.description: Broadcast a warning upon graceful shutdown

env.name: GAME_MOD_IDS
env.label: GAME_MOD_IDS
env.description: Additional game-mods you want to install, seperated by comma. (e.g. 487516323,487516324,487516325)

env.name: SERVER_NAME
env.label: SERVER_NAME
env.description: Name that will be shown in the server browser

env.name: WORLD_NAME
env.label: WORLD_NAME
env.description: Name of the world without .db/.fwl file extension

env.name: SERVER_PASS
env.label: SERVER_PASS
env.description: Password for logging into the server - min. 5 characters!

env.name: SERVER_PUBLIC
env.label: SERVER_PUBLIC
env.description: Whether the server should be listed in the server browser (true) or not (false)

env.name: SERVER_ARGS
env.label: SERVER_ARGS
env.description: Additional Valheim server CLI arguments

env.name: ADMINLIST_IDS
env.label: ADMINLIST_IDS
env.description: Space separated list of admin SteamIDs. Overrides any existing adminlist.txt entries!

env.name: BANNEDLIST_IDS
env.label: BANNEDLIST_IDS
env.description: Space separated list of banned SteamIDs. Overrides any existing bannedlist.txt entries!

env.name: PERMITTEDLIST_IDS
env.label: PERMITTEDLIST_IDS
env.description: Space separated list of whitelisted SteamIDs. Overrides any existing permittedlist.txt entries!

env.name: UPDATE_CRON
env.label: UPDATE_CRON
env.description: Cron schedule for update checks (disabled if set to an empty string or if the legacy UPDATE_INTERVAL is set)

env.name: UPDATE_IF_IDLE
env.label: UPDATE_IF_IDLE
env.description: Only run update check if no players are connected to the server (true or false)

env.name: RESTART_CRON
env.label: RESTART_CRON
env.description: Cron schedule for server restarts (disabled if set to an empty string)

env.name: RESTART_IF_IDLE
env.label: RESTART_IF_IDLE
env.description: Only run daily restart if no players are connected to the server (true or false)

env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Container time zone

env.name: BACKUPS
env.label: BACKUPS
env.description: Whether the server should create periodic backups (true or false)

env.name: BACKUPS_CRON
env.label: BACKUPS_CRON
env.description: Cron schedule for world backups (disabled if set to an empty string or if the legacy BACKUPS_INTERVAL is set)

env.name: BACKUPS_DIRECTORY
env.label: BACKUPS_DIRECTORY
env.description: Path to the backups directory

env.name: BACKUPS_MAX_AGE
env.label: BACKUPS_MAX_AGE
env.description: Age in days after which old backups are flushed

env.name: BACKUPS_MAX_COUNT
env.label: BACKUPS_MAX_COUNT
env.description: Maximum number of backups kept, 0 means infinity

env.name: BACKUPS_IF_IDLE
env.label: BACKUPS_IF_IDLE
env.description: Backup even when no players have been connected for a while

env.name: BACKUPS_IDLE_GRACE_PERIOD
env.label: BACKUPS_IDLE_GRACE_PERIOD
env.description: Grace period in seconds after the last player has disconnected in which we will still create backups when BACKUPS_IF_IDLE=false

env.name: PERMISSIONS_UMASK
env.label: PERMISSIONS_UMASK
env.description: Umask to use for backups, config files and directories

env.name: STEAMCMD_ARGS
env.label: STEAMCMD_ARGS
env.description: Additional steamcmd CLI arguments

env.name: VALHEIM_PLUS
env.label: VALHEIM_PLUS
env.description: Whether ValheimPlus mod should be loaded (config in /config/valheimplus, additional plugins in /config/valheimplus/plugins). Can not be used together with BEPINEX.

env.name: BEPINEX
env.label: BEPINEX
env.description: Whether BepInExPack Valheim mod should be loaded (config in /config/bepinex, plugins in /config/bepinex/plugins). Can not be used together with VALHEIM_PLUS.
